articles.title: Astellas nabs class-first FDA approval for CLDN18.2 gastric cancer med Vyloy - FiercePharma
articles.description: After a prior rejection, Astellas can head into the weekend celebrating a class-first FDA approval for its new gastric cancer med Vyloy. | Astellas' Vyloy won an FDA approval to treat gastric or gastroesophageal junction adenocarcinoma patients whose tumors a…
